RelatedSentence: AMMAN , May 19 ( KUNA ) -- Jordan 's Queen Rania Al - Abdullah launched Monday a not - for - profit platform for Massive Open Online Courses ( MOOCs ) in Arabic dubbed Edraak , the purpose is to create better education power opportunities for young Arabs .

RelatedSentence: In the opening ceremony , Queen Rania highlighted some of the challenges faced by the Arab world , from poor quality of education and graduates ' inability to meet the demands of the job market , to the limited number of global scientific publications released and the scarcity of exports in advanced technology as well as the skills gap in the region .

A0: a not-for-profit platform for Massive Open Online Courses -LRB- MOOCs -RRB- in Arabic dubbed `` Edraak , '' the purpose is to create better education power opportunities for young Arabs
RelatedSentence: The platform will bring the education power of MOOCs to the Arab world and is a reflection of Her Majesty 's commitment to expanding access to quality education across the region .

A1: a leading global MOOC provider founded by Harvard and MIT
RelatedSentence: Edraak , an initiative of the Queen Rania Foundation for Education and Development ( QRF ) , was developed based on edX technology , a leading global MOOC provider founded by Harvard and MIT .

A0: a not-for-profit platform for Massive Open Online Courses -LRB- MOOCs -RRB- in Arabic dubbed `` Edraak , '' the purpose is to create better education power opportunities for young Arabs
RelatedSentence: The platform will offer Arab learners access to courses taught at universities such as Harvard , MIT , and UC Berkeley , amongst others , at no cost to the learner , with the potential to earn certificates of mastery for certain courses .

A0: Edraak , an initiative of the Queen Rania Foundation for Education and Development -LRB- QRF -RRB-
RelatedSentence: In addition , Edraak will develop its own courses in Arabic taught by leading Arab faculty members and well - known professionals in a variety of fields , offering original Arabic content .
